name: Promoting the Cancer Surveillance Workforce, Education and Data Use
objective: The purpose of this program is to expand the capacity of CDC-funded National Program of Cancer Registries (NPCR) through external partners, to pursue activities that impact the national cancer surveillance workforce.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Authorized under section 301(a) of the Public Health Service Act, [42 U.S.C. section 241(a)], as amended.
